website_summaries.verdict: Durable and rugged construction meets comfort and cushioning that can take on the streets or the trails.
pros: Features Cloudfoam midsole for step-in comfort and superior support from Traxion outsole
Trail-rated grippy rubber outsole for trail running
Breathable mesh and synthetic overlays for running cooler
cons: Can be a bit snug initially

customer_reviews.title: Great Entry Level Shoe
customer_reviews.text: I don't trail run...or so I thought. Having broken my ankles twice and my foot once (not trail running) any type of impact has caused pain. These shoes are amazing though. I can run which I didn't think was possible for a decent distance and I have zero pain. Very supportive. I'm sure for the experienced hardcore runner these would not be what you want but for someone like me who's just doing the occasional run these are absolutely spot on.
customer_reviews.author: Haley

customer_reviews.title: Great traction for the Spartan Beast Race
customer_reviews.text: Great traction for the Spartan Beast Race. Did a superb job in the mud and an adequate job on the wood. Seems to be lacking in arch support, especially on the right foot. My foot seems to want to come down towards the inner sidewall rather than squarely on the bottom. I have never had a pair of shoes fit like that. Left shoe seems fine. These shoes actually looked a lot better than I expected them too, not that it mattered because I took them through the abuse of a Spartan Race about a week after I got them. They washed up and look nearly new again.
customer_reviews.author: HH

customer_reviews.title: Really durable, great traction, comfortable, stylish.
customer_reviews.text: Great fit, I use these for work. Great for walking though properties and yards that are developed and undeveloped. Hold up well in wet conditions. I have worn my last pair for 1 year every day for 8 hours working outside. walking up steep grades and in muddy loose soil or in leaves, grass, bushes. I use them for hiking and camping. I used them last year while helping my brother build his house. I even wear them to school and the store. Here is a picture of my shoes from last year. I decided to buy the green ones this year.
customer_reviews.author: Randall

customer_reviews.title: Great for hikes!
customer_reviews.text: It feels very comfortable and fits just right. I bought it mainly for hikes. My older pair of shoes are for running and the sole gets very slippery when even slightly wet. This pair has a sole designed for grip on rocks and uneven terrain, and the rubber also does not get slippery when wet. It also looks great (especially in the blue and black color) and certainly can be used for just going to the gym or a jog/run.
customer_reviews.author: A.G.

customer_reviews.title: Really durable for a great price
customer_reviews.text: I got these shoes almost 2 years ago now. They are still in great shape, although the soles are getting a bit worn. I wear them hiking, mountain biking, fishing, and as approach shoes for climbing. They hold up great! The mesh lets them air out quickly too. I replaced my leather hiking boots with these, and I don't think I'll ever go back. I don't you can get a better shoe for your money. Also they don't look terrible, although I don't really care about looks for my trail shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Ernest Macinderm

customer_reviews.title: Durable compound on the tread
customer_reviews.text: Overall a great shoe. I like the long lasting compound on the bottom, as I wear out shoes for my job where I'm frequently walking and pivoting in parking lots while inspecting vehicles. I typically use an insert for my plantar fasciitis, but have not had to do so with these shoes. I'll be ordering them again when I inevitably wear them out.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Hoekstra

customer_reviews.title: Fits bigger than expected.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent shoe, great design, but it fit larger than expected. I've previously owned Adidas Marathon 10 shoes, and I wore a size 10, which was a perfect fit; however, I purchased these shoes in a size 9 1/2 just in case they were made larger, but they still were too big. I didn't notice the size difference until I was using them for soccer out on the field, when I was making sharp turns and stopping. I could feel my foot slip around during the action, and I figured it would be too late to return them, since I had already dirtied them.
customer_reviews.author: edgartheartist

customer_reviews.title: Good shoes!
customer_reviews.text: These have been good, solid shoes so far. My kids are hard on the backs of shoes, preferring to leave them tied and push their foot into them which is just horrible on the shoes. So far, these have held up after two months of daily wear and the loop on the back helps keep the backs from getting broken down. My kid says they are very comfortable and they still look good. The color hides dirt well.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Wolf

customer_reviews.title: Has become my favorite tennis shoe
customer_reviews.text: Easily the most comfortable sneaker I've ever owned, trail or not. Got these and a pair ofat the same time. Both are super comfy but honestly, I like these Galaxy's better. Sturdy and comfortable without being heavy or clunky. Laces are positioned well and keep my foot secure with no heel slipping.
customer_reviews.author: JJovo

customer_reviews.title: Affordable trail shoes
customer_reviews.text: I’ve run a few times on trails with my road shoes before deciding to get a dedicated pair of running shoes for trails. I chose these shoes for the price and reviews and was not disappointed. The only complaint I have is that the lip of the shoe feels stiff and kind of cheap, but that has no effect on the feel of running in them. -Also, I saw some reviews suggesting to get a size up. I normally wear a 9 and the 9 I ordered fits perfectly
customer_reviews.author: Ben

customer_reviews.title: Grommet popped out on initial lacing.
customer_reviews.text: Shoe fits fine, typical of Adidas fit. My problem with it is that one of the grommets popped out the first time I tried to lace it. I'll go ahead and wear it, since I go through shoes in a matter of 3, 4 months anyway, but it felt cheaply-made.
customer_reviews.author: ZackAttack

customer_reviews.title: Love the look and feel
customer_reviews.text: They are a bit snug fitting but it is expected due to the type of sneaker this is. Otherwise the construction is great, shoe is super comfortable and looks great. Adidas is a good brand with a quality shoe
customer_reviews.author: Lee

customer_reviews.title: Nice shoe but runs very small
customer_reviews.text: They seem like good shoes, definitely more gray than they appear in the picture, but they run very small. I usually wear a 12 in dress shoes, 12.5 in running shoes, and these in a 12.5 are way small. Definitely go up a full size. Toe box is a little narrow as well.
customer_reviews.author: J.S.

customer_reviews.title: These shoes are very comfortable. I had previously bought a size 11 in ...
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are very comfortable. I had previously bought a size 11 in the same style but they were a bit tight and failed at the toe after about 9 months of wear. Hoping these will be a much better investment.
customer_reviews.author: BobW

customer_reviews.title: They hold up
customer_reviews.text: Comfy Only thing I do not like is thay track a lot of dirt. But what do ya expect ??
customer_reviews.author: Sctertrsh

customer_reviews.title: great value for adidas shoe
customer_reviews.text: great for trails or mowing the yard, only issue is that feet get hot in these, however makes for good autumn dog walker in crappy weather. laces could be better though.
customer_reviews.author: tizzy

customer_reviews.title: Adidas Performance tshoes
customer_reviews.text: There very nice and comfortable. Great support and good for exercise. love them
customer_reviews.author: Ozzy

customer_reviews.title: Terrific shoes
customer_reviews.text: Terrific. Have run and hiked in those for hundreds of miles. Very durable.
customer_reviews.author: By Wayland Wong

customer_reviews.title: Love the cloud foam
customer_reviews.text: These are nice for the price. I have only worn adidas for the past 5 years so I already new what to expect on the sizing.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas hamilton

customer_reviews.title: Really good material, thin insoles
customer_reviews.text: Owned for 5-6 months now, they are holding up VERY well, and I live in the country, constantly working or hiking in them. Only reason it’s not getting 5 stars is the insoles are really thin, your feet hurt after a few hours of standing/walking.
customer_reviews.author: Manny

customer_reviews.title: Used for Kid's OCR
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my son. Aggressive tread, good stability. Are a bit heavy when wet. Otherwise, solid shoe.
customer_reviews.author: ghostwriter4567

customer_reviews.title: Not as comfortable as my last pair of galaxy trail shoes
customer_reviews.text: Not as comfortable as my last pair of galaxy trail shoes, but still decent. Colors are cool. Get a lot of compliments on them. And the price was unbeatable.
customer_reviews.author: stacie

customer_reviews.title: Good trail runner
customer_reviews.text: Ordered these trail runners specifically for a 10k trail/mud run. They felt great, gave me great traction, and cleaned up perfectly after a spin through the wash.
customer_reviews.author: Spack02

customer_reviews.title: Very nice looking shoe for the price
customer_reviews.text: Very nice looking shoe for the price, Yeah you just can't go wrong with a good pair of adidas shoes keep the low price and sale!
customer_reviews.author: G.o

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Fits well. Lots of cushioning on the sides which makes the fit comfortable but also makes the shoe warm for those 100F days.
customer_reviews.author: dmk

customer_reviews.title: I am going outside
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are great for walking around outside. I love the traction and they hold up well. I retired the last pair by running a 14 mile Spartan Beast race. I note, that was the retirement ceremony.
customer_reviews.author: J. Walker

customer_reviews.title: Solid product, price and delivery.
customer_reviews.text: Brand new. Exactly as expected. The gray trim color was a little different than I thought but that was probably because I was surfing amazon on my phone in night mode or something. Not different enough that it bothered me. Great product and speedy delivery.
customer_reviews.author: tuck

customer_reviews.title: Very confortable
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes fit as expected did not need to buy a size up.
customer_reviews.author: michael scheffler

customer_reviews.title: Fit perfect and very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Fit perfect, very comfortable, great tread for trails, look great, and the price couldn't be beat. Will buy another pair when these wear out if I can find them
customer_reviews.author: MIke

customer_reviews.title: Good dad tenny as my girl says
customer_reviews.text: Comfort, cheap, and not flashy. Good dad tenny as my girl says.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas S Blome

customer_reviews.title: Love my Galaxy.
customer_reviews.text: Love my fav Galaxy but these fit a little small. Same size as my other pair.
customer_reviews.author: Therese Cooper

customer_reviews.title: Fits Great and Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for a Tough Mudder race. Held up great and supper comfortable
customer_reviews.author: Saverhinos

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable shoes, good support and good thickness in the soles
customer_reviews.author: TChilton

customer_reviews.title: Great Style.
customer_reviews.text: I love the style. They feel a bit more clunky than my ASICS Gel Venture 5's for running, so I use them more for walking and casual anything. Good enough to take traveling and use for all-purpose.
customer_reviews.author: Gray

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Using it for last one year and its really confortable
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very Comfortable. I ordered one size larger and was glad ...
customer_reviews.text: Very Comfortable. I ordered one size larger and was glad I did. Had the same experience with the TraceRocker Trail shoe. One of the red grommets at the top was missing, but I repaired it myself since the fit was good. It's too early to see how they hold up.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: they surprisingly fit very comfortable and are super light
customer_reviews.text: Was not expecting much for the price and bought them for a spartan race, they surprisingly fit very comfortable and are super light, let's see how they hold up after the race, I'll update if I can.
customer_reviews.author: FD0110

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the most comfortable shoes I've ever worn. Good arch support and cushion. I even bought a second pair!
customer_reviews.author: ED

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Worth the money and great for walking around but could use a wider heel cup/surface platform.
customer_reviews.author: Kirk Larson

customer_reviews.title: These shoes are very comfortable and they breathe very well
customer_reviews.text: as described, quick shipping. These shoes are very comfortable and they breathe very well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Light weight shoe
customer_reviews.text: Light weight trail shoe. Seemed a little large, but if you wear two socks when hiking or running trials this should work.
customer_reviews.author: Ron

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: i got it for my husband and he love it .
customer_reviews.author: vanessa stabler

customer_reviews.title: little or no support
customer_reviews.text: Looks great, but very uncomfortable offering little or no support, feet hurts after 4 hours of normal wear. Makes wonder if these are genuine Adidas also insoles are not removable, the last pair of Adidas i owned the insoles were removable.
customer_reviews.author: sinned yarrum

customer_reviews.title: Great for traction off road
customer_reviews.text: Use these for running off road, they are comfortable and seem like they will last a while.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes and look sharp. Fit comfortably and are breathable. I get compliments when I wear these alot
customer_reviews.author: J Walden

customer_reviews.title: I JUST LIKE TO MODIFY EVERYTHING!
customer_reviews.text: Wish the insoles could be removed, to insert an upgrade. They seem to be glued in.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Karpook

customer_reviews.title: 3months later i still like to wear this shoe and am buying another pair ...
customer_reviews.text: i was in search of a rugged everyday walkin shoe that would keep my foot dry. this is it. 3months later i still like to wear this shoe and am buying another pair to replace it.
customer_reviews.author: lena mac

customer_reviews.title: Great for Hiking
customer_reviews.text: This shoe is very comfortable. It provided great comfort, traction, and stability during my hike into the Grand Canyon.
customer_reviews.author: M. Zimmerman

customer_reviews.title: Good trail runner!
customer_reviews.text: Great fitting shoe to get me back on the trails. May need a 2nd pair to wear as daily shoes.
customer_reviews.author: J R Hayes II

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very Nice shoe, fit a little snug but I am sure it will stretch out.
customer_reviews.author: Mark P.

customer_reviews.title: Good for trails
customer_reviews.text: Good sole with support. Comfortable fit. Ideal for my trail runs.
customer_reviews.author: willard

customer_reviews.title: The quality of the shoe is good, but the fit is TIGHT
customer_reviews.text: The quality of the shoe is good, but the fit is TIGHT. The toe is narrow. Order 1/2 size larger than normal and you'll be fine.
customer_reviews.author: DR W

customer_reviews.title: Comfy
customer_reviews.text: Spacious in the toe area and very comfy. I don't use them for running, just normal walking and hanging out. My go to sneakers.
customer_reviews.author: headclouds

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Shoes are very comfortable, I use them for softball great traction fit as expected
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not a good fit.
customer_reviews.text: This shoe hits my heels, while other adidas shoes do not.
customer_reviews.author: Rene Varga

customer_reviews.title: Too big
customer_reviews.text: Shoes looked great. Sadly enough, I had to return them. They were a size or so too big.
customer_reviews.author: Rodney

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I like the shoe.. It is put together well, very light and would consider buying it again
customer_reviews.author: David Wilkes

customer_reviews.title: It's perfect
customer_reviews.text: They are very comfortable, and fit very well, which makes running a comfortable experience, have a very elegant design. I just like them !!
customer_reviews.author: Roberto

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes! Fit is as expected, good cushioning and very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Gockley

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and comfortable shoes.
customer_reviews.text: Good quality shoes and very comfortable. I couldn't expect less from Adidas.
customer_reviews.author: José Acuña

customer_reviews.title: Nice kicks
customer_reviews.text: So far i am liking the sneakers, they definitely look better in person than the picture.
customer_reviews.author: DavidO.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my 14 year old outdoor active son
customer_reviews.text: Shoes are as expected. Fits true to size. Made with quality and durable materials. Perfect for my 14 year old outdoor active son.
customer_reviews.author: Ikea Hall

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied!
customer_reviews.text: Looks great. Perfectly cushioned and comfortable for performance runs. Looking for another Performance Men's Galaxy Trail Runner shoe! Thanks, Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: Jose Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Bit small, but good.
customer_reviews.text: A little bit small. I usually wear size 8, ordered size 8 1/2 and fits exactly. Overall, good quality. Nice price with discount.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Check quality control.
customer_reviews.text: Seemed as if the left shoe was actually shorter/smaller in size even though it read to be the same size. I have never had this problem before with other shoes. Other than this, the right shoe fit great and probably would have been good shoes but I had to return.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice, light shoes. They seem pretty tough but time will tell
customer_reviews.author: Paul Cihak

customer_reviews.title: Great buy and well priced.
customer_reviews.text: Great show for trail hiking/running. Quick drying and easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: MAC

customer_reviews.title: nice shoes - light
customer_reviews.text: nice shoes - light, nice color, upgrade in traction from last trail running shoes (pumas). even though light, shoe has more padding and structure than one would expect. true to fit, my feet are as 10 as 10 gets, all be it with a narrow foot. still nice and snug when laced up. nice shoes that are going to get some serious miles
customer_reviews.author: drtalos

customer_reviews.title: Wear a 12 in pretty much all shoes
customer_reviews.text: Big Toe seems to rub a bit. Wear a 12 in pretty much all shoes. a 12.5 would be perfect but half sizes after 12 practically don't exist.
customer_reviews.author: L. Raleigh-Klimowicz

customer_reviews.title: Likes just fine
customer_reviews.text: They are my husband's shoes. He's had the same brand before and liked them so he got the brand again. He says he likes them just fine and they fit okay.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon K. James

customer_reviews.title: My first pair of adidas in 8 years.
customer_reviews.text: They fit great, very comfortable. My feet are wide, most shoes I have to break in, but these fit great right off the shelf.
customer_reviews.author: Shanda knight

customer_reviews.title: which is probably good for a running shoe)
customer_reviews.text: It fit as expected (a bit snug, which is probably good for a running shoe). I've been wearing it for some 2-mile runs. The sole feels nice and soft.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So so
customer_reviews.text: already have indents from my feet after very little wear
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Overholt

customer_reviews.title: ... shoes on a run but they feel and look great!
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t take the shoes on a run but they feel and look great!
customer_reviews.author: EG

customer_reviews.title: False Advertised
customer_reviews.text: The shoes are good but falsely advertised. The shoes were a completely different color than expected. One sell point was the color for my son. I'm not a fan of false advertising. Ordered the royal blue, black, red, grey... for the grey on grey.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Boyd

customer_reviews.title: Works great on my par cor
customer_reviews.text: Works great on my par cor. I jump off of sidewalks and sometimes down a stair or two. Have only been wearing over the weekend and seem to fit good. I would recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: adidas Performance Men's Galaxy M Trail Runner
product_meta.description: Take your run off road with these men's trail running shoes. Breathable uppers are reinforced for rugged trail conditions and traxion outsole grips dirt, rock and roots, so you can hit the trail with confidence.
feature_bullets: Shaft measures approximately low-top from arch
